title: Bypassing WAFs in Modern Web Apps
description: Analyzing web application firewalls and developing novel evasion techniques for modern cloud environments.

title: Android Malware: Reversing the Unreachable
description: Deep dive into sophisticated Android malware that uses advanced anti-analysis and obfuscation techniques.

title: IoT Botnets: The Rise of the Machines
description: Exploring the rapid evolution of IoT botnets and the large-scale DDoS attacks that threaten infrastructure.

title: iOS Kernel Exploitation: Escaping the Sandbox
description: An technical analysis of recent iOS kernel vulnerabilities and the chain required to achieve full device control.

title: Defending the Matrix: Zero Trust Architecture
description: Strategies for implementing a robust Zero Trust framework to protect critical data in highly hostile networks.

title: Social Engineering: Hiding in Plain Sight
description: Examining the psychological triggers used in advanced phishing and physical entry social engineering campaigns.
